links.*: The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''''gweith''''' is a [[Noldorin]] noun meaning "manhood". The meaning is often extended to mean "man-power, troop of able-bodied men, host, regiment".<ref name=LR/><ref>{{VT|46a}}, p. 21</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] WEG ("manly vigour")<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 398</ref>
==See also==
*Sindarin ''[[gwaith]]''
